LABEL: 0x1B3
STRING: The <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x1D0
STRING: This confined submarine.

LABEL: 0x1F4
STRING: We were under attack by numerous threats.

LABEL: 0x218
STRING: Deep sea creatures, bacteria, viruses...

LABEL: 0x240
STRING: Death upon death kept piling up.

LABEL: 0x25C
STRING: In the rear section observation deck, there was a mountain of corpses.

LABEL: 0x286
STRING: There was the missing Hikari.

LABEL: 0x2A0
STRING: There was Tokiwa, engulfed by <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x2CC
STRING: Yukari had fallen into eternal sleep.

LABEL: 0x2F0
STRING: Reiri was lying inside the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x36F
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x387
STRING: My finger that had pulled the trigger was numb.

LABEL: 0x3AF
STRING: I held my convulsing hand down with my other.

LABEL: 0x409
STRING: How could one imagine anything worse than this?

LABEL: 0x447
STRING: Everything that needed to happen had already happened.

LABEL: 0x47B
STRING: The wave of death was gaining momentum,

LABEL: 0x4B3
STRING: threatening to swallow us whole.

LABEL: 0x4F5
STRING: That's right... Everything was about to become the past.

LABEL: 0x529
STRING: When did the end begin?

LABEL: 0x55F
STRING: When would the end come?

LABEL: 0x63B
STRING: I closed the door to the dark warehouse and looked up.

LABEL: 0x667
STRING: There was no longer any sign of Touri in the hallway.

LABEL: 0x69F
STRING: That was only natural... How long had it been since she had run away toward the rescue ship?

LABEL: 0x6F9
STRING: ...She must have already seen Reiri's corpse.

LABEL: 0x737
STRING: What kind of a face would the girl who'd witnessed the death of her beloved sister make?

LABEL: 0x785
STRING: All hope for her had been cut off.

LABEL: 0x7B5
STRING: And, I was the one responsible.

LABEL: 0x7E3
STRING: What would she think next, as she lost the faint hope she had left?

LABEL: 0x82B
STRING: Seeing the reality and truth with her own eyes,

LABEL: 0x859
STRING: having her transient hope and dreams cut off,

LABEL: 0x887
STRING: Touri was left in the depths of despair.

LABEL: 0x8A9
STRING: We had lost so much that we had nothing left to lose.

LABEL: 0x94C
STRING: But even so――

LABEL: 0x96E
STRING: We had to get out of here.

LABEL: 0x9A8
STRING: 「We have to leave... We have to get out...」

LABEL: 0x9D8
STRING: The words left my mouth.

LABEL: 0x9F6
STRING: They were words I had repeated over and over again, to myself and to others.

LABEL: 0xA38
STRING: Now, they turned into determination.

LABEL: 0xA56
STRING: What were once just words were now coated in myriad memories as I repeated them.

LABEL: 0xAA6
STRING: It was now a vow that couldn't be broken.

LABEL: 0xADC
STRING: A morning star that guided me through the ruins.

LABEL: 0xB89
STRING: There was no point in standing around here.

LABEL: 0xBC3
STRING: I started walking, driven by impulse.

LABEL: 0xC05
STRING: But, where to?

LABEL: 0xC23
STRING: The first thing that came to my mind was Touri's face.

LABEL: 0xC4D
STRING: The girl who had lost her beloved sister.

LABEL: 0xC71
STRING: A wounded girl who needed someone to vent her feelings on.

LABEL: 0xCAB
STRING: She might be waiting for me on the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0xCE7
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0xCFF
STRING: There was still something I had to do.

LABEL: 0xD43
STRING: I felt bad for Touri, but I couldn't go to her yet.

LABEL: 0xD7F
STRING: Where I had to go wasn't the rescue ship――

LABEL: 0x1031
STRING: The <Onyx>.

LABEL: 0x1049
STRING: It was a device that could extract and replay information from the black box

LABEL: 0x109E
STRING: containing all the events that had occurred on the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x10D6
STRING: Since Yukari didn't have it, the wheelhouse was the next most likely place it would be in.

LABEL: 0x112C
STRING: We were going to return to the surface using the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x11BD
STRING: And... I'd probably never return to the bottom of this sea again.

LABEL: 0x1203
STRING: Just as Hiragino had said, this ship had been infected by <COOS> and would never again be recovered.

LABEL: 0x1269
STRING: Everything would be buried at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x128F
STRING: A place no one would ever visit again.

LABEL: 0x12B7
STRING: A graveyard that no one would ever uncover again.

LABEL: 0x12E1
STRING: But... was that really okay?

LABEL: 0x1317
STRING: Was it okay to let it all be buried?

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: ――There was no way it was.

LABEL: 0x13D4
STRING: We had to tell the surface what had happened inside this ship.

LABEL: 0x1418
STRING: What we got involved in and how we survived.

LABEL: 0x1466
STRING: We had to send the wishes of everyone who'd died to back the surface.

LABEL: 0x14AE
STRING: Burying all of that was unforgivable.

LABEL: 0x159E
STRING: I arrived at the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x15BA
STRING: I had come here on a whim, and there was no guarantee that anything would come of it.

LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: I couldn't even be sure that it was still inside this ship...

LABEL: 0x163E
STRING: But, all I could do was believe.

LABEL: 0x1674
STRING: Believe in the possibility――

LABEL: 0x168E
STRING: I slowly walked forward.

LABEL: 0x16B4
STRING: The room was dark with its main power turned off.

LABEL: 0x16DC
STRING: The air was damp.

LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: I brushed a barely glowing panel in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x1738
STRING: It was a gruesome sight, with scars left by the destruction.

LABEL: 0x177E
STRING: My hand was caught in a depression that I couldn't see.

LABEL: 0x17C2
STRING: It was a geometrically shaped cavity, different from the traces of destruction.

LABEL: 0x1802
STRING: A square, cube-shaped space, smaller than a fist.

LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: 「This is the <Onyx's>――」

LABEL: 0x186A
STRING: The Onyx's original location.

LABEL: 0x1892
STRING: However, it was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x18B8
STRING: Did it roll off somewhere?

LABEL: 0x18FC
STRING: 「It's black and small enough to fit in my hand...」

LABEL: 0x192E
STRING: Honestly, something like that was extremely hard to find inside this dark room.

LABEL: 0x1976
STRING: For the time being, I turned around.

LABEL: 0x1A30
STRING: Sure enough, I couldn't see it anywhere.

LABEL: 0x1A5C
STRING: However, if Yukari didn't bring it with her after using it, she should have left it here in the wheelhouse...

LABEL: 0x1B98
STRING: Just then, a sharp headache assaulted me.

LABEL: 0x1BBC
STRING: My legs went weak.

LABEL: 0x1C8A
STRING: ...As I thought, my injuries from the explosion were gradually getting worse.

LABEL: 0x1CCA
STRING: I wasn't lying when I said I was fine earlier.

LABEL: 0x1D0A
STRING: The fact that I wasn't feeling well now must be temporary, but I didn't feel like I was getting better at all.

LABEL: 0x1D66
STRING: I couldn't afford to be stuck here.

LABEL: 0x1DA6
STRING: If I could at least figure out if the <Onyx> was in here or not...

LABEL: 0x1DEE
STRING: 「Oh, yeah. Those things.」

LABEL: 0x1E12
STRING: I took the smart glasses out of my pocket.

LABEL: 0x1E48
STRING: I had borrowed them from the sleeping Yukari.

LABEL: 0x1E76
STRING: I touched the edge of the glasses and flipped the switch.

LABEL: 0x1EAA
STRING: With a retro-sounding "vwoom," a start-up screen appeared.

LABEL: 0x1F06
STRING: And then... Okay.

LABEL: 0x1F26
STRING: After a few seconds of waiting, an AR navigation menu was projected.

LABEL: 0x1F60
STRING: If this was paired with the <Onyx>―――

LABEL: 0x1F9C
STRING: Eventually, I looked down at my feet... and it appeared before me.

LABEL: 0x204A
STRING: 「Is this it...?」

LABEL: 0x2070
STRING: I crouched down and picked it up.

LABEL: 0x2098
STRING: It was heavy and cold.

LABEL: 0x20BC
STRING: The black cube seemed to swallow light.

LABEL: 0x20EA
STRING: ...It was dark matter in the mundane sense, and not cosmologically speaking.

LABEL: 0x2122
STRING: A jet-black object that seemed to absorb all the light around it.

LABEL: 0x215E
STRING: As its name suggested, it was reminiscent of a black agate, but in reality, it was a delicate memory machine.

LABEL: 0x21AC
STRING: Yes, this was a storage device.

LABEL: 0x2270
STRING: 「If I do this――」

LABEL: 0x228C
STRING: If the <Onyx> was connected to the <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x22BD
STRING: everything that had happened on this ship would be reconstructed

LABEL: 0x22F6
STRING: based on the information detected by the onboard sensors,

LABEL: 0x2338
STRING: and stored in this device as a single, unified piece of information.

LABEL: 0x237A
STRING: All of that information in a tiny dice like this――

LABEL: 0x23A8
STRING: A small cube that could fit in one hand.

LABEL: 0x23D4
STRING: At a quick glance, it might look like a small work of art or an accessory.

LABEL: 0x241C
STRING: It was completely black,

LABEL: 0x2462
STRING: and I couldn't see any kind of a switch anywhere on it.

LABEL: 0x24AE
STRING: I toyed with the <Onyx> with my fingertips and set it into the space I had just found.

LABEL: 0x2563
STRING: Instantly, there was a light vibration sound.

LABEL: 0x2583
STRING: Did it... connect?

LABEL: 0x25A5
STRING: Only the <Onyx> was lightly vibrating in the middle of the power outage.

LABEL: 0x25FB
STRING: There was no doubt that it was getting power from somewhere, but was it really working properly?

LABEL: 0x265B
STRING: Would it still have any records left?

LABEL: 0x2699
STRING: ...I wasn't sure.

LABEL: 0x26B7
STRING: All I could do right now was wait――

LABEL: 0x2701
STRING: There was no need to wait for long. The vibration stopped.

LABEL: 0x273B
STRING: 「Is the transmission... over?」

LABEL: 0x2765
STRING: Only my voice echoed through the silent room.

LABEL: 0x279B
STRING: I placed my hand on the black cube in front of me.

LABEL: 0x27C9
STRING: On the black mass that was no longer vibrating.

LABEL: 0x27F1
STRING: I took it out.

LABEL: 0x2813
STRING: The <Onyx> was in my hand again.

LABEL: 0x2837
STRING: In terms of appearance and weight, I couldn't spot any difference from before...

LABEL: 0x28E3
STRING: However.

LABEL: 0x28F9
STRING: If the recording device of the <SHEEP III> and the <Onyx> were operating normally, then...

LABEL: 0x2948
STRING: All the records should now be inside it.

LABEL: 0x29FB
STRING: This tiny thing housed everything that had happened inside this ship.

LABEL: 0x2AB1
STRING: All of the events and all of the stories...?

LABEL: 0x2B3E
STRING: 「Sounds like a joke.」

LABEL: 0x2B5E
STRING: I murmured to no one in particular.

LABEL: 0x2B7E
STRING: It had only been a few days.

LABEL: 0x2BA2
STRING: Nevertheless, the density of my time here was not comparable to that on the surface, where I'd lived in a state of idle existence.

LABEL: 0x2BF2
STRING: I had met many people over the past few days.

LABEL: 0x2D1F
STRING: The time I had spent with them when I was supposed to be just another passenger.

LABEL: 0x2D5D
STRING: I guess the suspension bridge effect really was true.

LABEL: 0x2F0E
STRING: It was also said that there was constant conflict among the sailors on Columbus' ship.

LABEL: 0x2F5A
STRING: In this confined space known as the <SHEEP III>, we had met, spent our time together, and...

LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: ...And parted ways.

LABEL: 0x3118
STRING: I looked down at the <Onyx> in the palm of my hand.

LABEL: 0x314A
STRING: Inside, their lively and living figures were preserved.

LABEL: 0x3196
STRING: Chaos and despair had been our constant companions since the moment we met,

LABEL: 0x31DA
STRING: but even so, there had definitely been moments of peace.

LABEL: 0x320C
STRING: Momentary exchanges, touches, and smiles.

LABEL: 0x324A
STRING: That was what was preserved in here.

LABEL: 0x3278
STRING: ...If I played it back, I would see everyone alive again.

LABEL: 0x32BA
STRING: Sweet temptations like VR drugs and technology religions had gained popularity not too long ago.

LABEL: 0x3374
STRING: After I lost my only family member and sister,

LABEL: 0x33BC
STRING: those sorts of shady people had come to my doorstep.

LABEL: 0x33EE
STRING: Averting your eyes from reality, holding on to a dream that couldn't even be called hope...

LABEL: 0x3440
STRING: At the time, even in the midst of despair, I couldn't understand it.

LABEL: 0x3484
STRING: But, for some reason, I now understood why they felt like clinging to such a dream.

LABEL: 0x356C
STRING: Hah. A self-deprecating breath escaped my lips.

LABEL: 0x3596
STRING: I might be overly familiar with death, as cliched as it sounded.

LABEL: 0x35D2
STRING: I thought I was used to despair after what happened to Nee-san...

LABEL: 0x3618
STRING: But, I couldn't keep running away from my thoughts forever.

LABEL: 0x3658
STRING: I gripped my shaking hand with the other.

LABEL: 0x3684
STRING: 「I have to play it back...」

LABEL: 0x36AE
STRING: I took out the smart glasses again and put them on.

LABEL: 0x36E4
STRING: The AR vision captured the <Onyx>.

LABEL: 0x3710
STRING: I followed the lines of characters in the message window with my eyes.

LABEL: 0x374A
STRING: 『Storage medium found.』

LABEL: 0x3772
STRING: 『Initiating synchronization.』

LABEL: 0x3794
STRING: The synchronization was over in an instant.

LABEL: 0x37BE
STRING: By the time I looked at the progress bar, it had already reached 100%%.

LABEL: 0x37F9
STRING: 『Start playback?』

LABEL: 0x3819
STRING: I responded to the question with eye input.

LABEL: 0x384D
STRING: The next moment――

LABEL: 0x3D6B
STRING: A vortex of images assaulted me.

LABEL: 0x3D8D
STRING: An exchange of scenes.

LABEL: 0x3DA7
STRING: Audio interference.

LABEL: 0x3DC1
STRING: A torrent of colors.

LABEL: 0x3DDB
STRING: Countless collated records, frame-by-frame.

LABEL: 0x3E11
STRING: Cubist-like images of various scenes and time frames were displayed as they overlapped.

LABEL: 0x3E65
STRING: At the same time, what struck me was the sound of a combination of endless fast-forward and reverse-playback scenes.

LABEL: 0x3EB5
STRING: The sound that flowed in through my temple, interfering with my hearing, robbed me of my bodily senses.

LABEL: 0x3F15
STRING: A headache that wasn't due to my physical condition or injuries washed over me.

LABEL: 0x3F4D
STRING: My eyes flickered, and I felt nauseous.

LABEL: 0x3FDC
STRING: ...It was like torture.

LABEL: 0x4004
STRING: I shook my head, trying to escape from the images.

LABEL: 0x403C
STRING: I couldn't bear to watch something like this.

LABEL: 0x4076
STRING: My brain creaked.

LABEL: 0x408E
STRING: Endless information flowed into my vision and hearing.

LABEL: 0x40BC
STRING: The many faces and lives of the countless recorded people.

LABEL: 0x40FC
STRING: I couldn't take it all in――

LABEL: 0x4136
STRING: I put my hand on the glasses, and just as I was about to pull them off, I stopped myself.

LABEL: 0x417E
STRING: ――Yukari had seen all this by herself...

LABEL: 0x420B
STRING: 「――Aaahh!」

LABEL: 0x422B
STRING: I opened my eyes wide and stared at the lenses.

LABEL: 0x425D
STRING: And then, eventually――

LABEL: 0x427F
STRING: A single scene appeared.

LABEL: 0x42A1
STRING: I looked at it.

LABEL: 0x42BD
STRING: I kept looking.

LABEL: 0x42EF
STRING: The image I focused on gradually got closer and closer...

LABEL: 0x4329
STRING: It was――

LABEL: 0x43FB
STRING: A girl bleeding from her head.

LABEL: 0x441D
STRING: Just looking at it was painful.

LABEL: 0x4449
STRING: I couldn't help but close my eyes at the approaching vortex of colors――

LABEL: 0x4500
STRING: ――When I opened them again, I saw Hikari right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x453A
STRING: Before I knew it, I was in a memory inside virtual reality.

LABEL: 0x458B
STRING: It was a highly accurate re-creation.

LABEL: 0x45AD
STRING: It was as if I really existed in this space.

LABEL: 0x45F9
STRING: I surveyed my surroundings.

LABEL: 0x468A
STRING: 「Is this... the bridge?」

LABEL: 0x46B0
STRING: My voice reached no one and faded away inside the memory.

LABEL: 0x46EA
STRING: This was the bridge... but I didn't know when.

LABEL: 0x4728
STRING: And, there was a presence that was not supposed to be there.

LABEL: 0x4760
STRING: 「Hikari... Hikari!」

LABEL: 0x4780
STRING: I couldn't help but cry out.

LABEL: 0x47A0
STRING: I forgot that I was nothing more than a ghost in this space-time.

LABEL: 0x47E2
STRING: But still... that was Hikari.

LABEL: 0x480A
STRING: I couldn't believe I got to see her again.

LABEL: 0x4842
STRING: She lay on the floor.

LABEL: 0x4862
STRING: She was already unconscious.

LABEL: 0x4882
STRING: She was covered in so much blood that it was impossible to tell where she was bleeding from.

LABEL: 0x48CA
STRING: It was already too late for her...

LABEL: 0x48FA
STRING: Despite that, she moved.

LABEL: 0x491E
STRING: Hikari moved slowly, sliding on the floor.

LABEL: 0x495A
STRING: Like she was being dragged.

LABEL: 0x4982
STRING: No, she was being dragged.

LABEL: 0x49AC
STRING: And the person dragging her was――

LABEL: 0x4A37
STRING: Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4A4D
STRING: 「Why is she...?」

LABEL: 0x4A7F
STRING: Hikari had called Touri her sister.

LABEL: 0x4AA3
STRING: But, Touri's sister was Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4AC9
STRING: So why was Reiri dragging Hikari?

LABEL: 0x4AF5
STRING: And why was her body in a place like this?

LABEL: 0x4B2F
STRING: Endless questions clouded my mind.

LABEL: 0x4B5F
STRING: Hikari should have died and disappeared into the sea... After all, the finger Hiragino took out from that fish...

LABEL: 0x4BD1
STRING: I immediately looked down at her corpse.

LABEL: 0x4BFF
STRING: ...They were all there.

LABEL: 0x4C17
STRING: Not a single finger was missing.

LABEL: 0x4C3D
STRING: Why the hell was Hikari's fully-intact corpse here?

LABEL: 0x4C81
STRING: She was supposed to be dead.

LABEL: 0x4CA7
STRING: I was supposed to be the one who left her to die――

LABEL: 0x4CDD
STRING: I got a flashback of the past.

LABEL: 0x4D05
STRING: Hikari was laughing inside the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x4D27
STRING: Countless corpses littered the observation deck after the accident.

LABEL: 0x4D57
STRING: How did she end up here when she should have disappeared along with the rest?

LABEL: 0x4D97
STRING: My questions led to more questions, none of which were resolved, but the images in front of my eyes never stopped.

LABEL: 0x4DF3
STRING: Eventually, Reiri stopped.

LABEL: 0x4EA3
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x4EC2
STRING: Reiri clicked her tongue bitterly.

LABEL: 0x4EEE
STRING: ...Touri?

LABEL: 0x4F20
STRING: Reiri stood there, frozen in place while still dragging Hikari behind her.

LABEL: 0x4F50
STRING: A supple finger appeared from somewhere, tracing the nape of Reiri's neck,

LABEL: 0x4F92
STRING: and before long, her slender neck was enveloped in the palm of someone's hand.

LABEL: 0x4FDC
STRING: I raised my voice, forgetting that it couldn't reach her.

LABEL: 0x5008
STRING: Reiri had no way of resisting.

LABEL: 0x5041
STRING: 「Aaa――」

LABEL: 0x5062
STRING: She let out a voice deep from her throat.

LABEL: 0x5080
STRING: She let go of Hikari, and before long, Reiri's hand hung limply in the air.

LABEL: 0x50BA
STRING: Confirming that Reiri had stopped resisting, the owner of the hands around her neck slowly relaxed.

LABEL: 0x511D
STRING: Reiri fell to the floor.

LABEL: 0x513B
STRING: There were marks left on her neck where she was strangled.

LABEL: 0x51EC
STRING: When I looked up, I saw Touri.

LABEL: 0x5222
STRING: With a vacant expression, she gazed down at Reiri, who now lay on the floor like a corpse.

LABEL: 0x5264
STRING: Why would she――?

LABEL: 0x5282
STRING: In the end, it wasn't her own sister that she reached toward, but the girl beside her.

LABEL: 0x52F2
STRING: Hikari was being dragged away once again.

LABEL: 0x5320
STRING: Touri didn't seem to mind all the blood getting on her clothes as she continued dragging her.

LABEL: 0x5368
STRING: Where on earth was Reiri heading to before all this?

LABEL: 0x53AE
STRING: What was that frail girl trying to do...?

LABEL: 0x53FA
STRING: But, there was no way to know that now.

LABEL: 0x5432
STRING: All I could do right now was see where Touri was headed.

LABEL: 0x547E
STRING: The two of them went into the emergency room, and then through the hatch.

LABEL: 0x5518
STRING: Eventually, she came out of the hatch alone.

LABEL: 0x5637
STRING: And finally, she smashed the protective glass of the fire alarm as hard as she could――

LABEL: 0x59BD
STRING: I took off my smart glasses and exhaled.

LABEL: 0x59EB
STRING: I was terribly nauseous... Was it because of the injury or because of what I had seen?

LABEL: 0x5A3B
STRING: 「...What was that...?」

LABEL: 0x5A63
STRING: What was that footage...?

LABEL: 0x5A89
STRING: The <Onyx> that transferred the records of the <SHEEP III>...

LABEL: 0x5ABC
STRING: Was that the truth?

LABEL: 0x5ADC
STRING: 「What's going on...?」

LABEL: 0x5B00
STRING: 「Why would Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x5B2C
STRING: 「And Touri... Doing that to Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x5B50
STRING: I organized the images I saw with my own eyes.

LABEL: 0x5B7C
STRING: Was that really the truth?

LABEL: 0x5BA6
STRING: Or――

LABEL: 0x5BC0
STRING: Touri had strangled Reiri and rang the fire alarm.

LABEL: 0x5BFC
STRING: When Reiri was found the second time,

LABEL: 0x5C28
STRING: the person who'd left those strangulation marks on her neck was Touri...?

LABEL: 0x5CDC
STRING: 「Why would she...?」

LABEL: 0x5CFE
STRING: Why would Touri, who had been so devoted to Reiri, want to hurt her own sister?

LABEL: 0x5D4A
STRING: On top of that, she dumped Hikari's corpse from the hatch into the sea...

LABEL: 0x5D8A
STRING: That was impossible.

LABEL: 0x5DA4
STRING: There had to be some mistake.

LABEL: 0x5DCE
STRING: I could understand if Reiri was the one hitting Touri,

LABEL: 0x5E04
STRING: but it was almost like she was trying to kill Reiri...

LABEL: 0x5EDA
STRING: 「Touri――」

LABEL: 0x5EF4
STRING: I found myself visiting the emergency room next.

LABEL: 0x5F26
STRING: Yukari was still sleeping on the other side of the curtain.

LABEL: 0x5F5A
STRING: But now...

LABEL: 0x5F78
STRING: I turned my eyes to the pressurization room where that blood-covered girl had been carried away.

LABEL: 0x5FBA
STRING: An open hatch.

LABEL: 0x5FEE
STRING: There was no longer any sign of Hikari on the other side.

LABEL: 0x601E
STRING: The rescue ship was now there instead――

LABEL: 0x6056
STRING: Clatter――

LABEL: 0x606E
STRING: There was a sound of someone stepping on the ramp.

LABEL: 0x608E
STRING: Slowly, from the other side of the door, appeared...

LABEL: 0x6184
STRING: A single girl, just like in the footage.

LABEL: 0x61D1
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x6257
STRING: 「Oh, Katagiri-san――」

LABEL: 0x62D6
STRING: 「Reiri's alive!」

LABEL: 0x62FF
STRING: The girl spoke.

LABEL: 0x631B
STRING: She was alone.

LABEL: 0x6339
STRING: 「Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x63B2
STRING: What was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x63D4
STRING: She was the one who killed Reiri... No, that wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x6404
STRING: It wasn't that Touri had killed her.

LABEL: 0x642C
STRING: But, wasn't Reiri dead inside the rescue ship?

LABEL: 0x646C
STRING: That was what I had tried to show her.

LABEL: 0x650B
STRING: She was smiling from ear to ear... No, she looked somewhat bewildered right now,

LABEL: 0x6549
STRING: but either way, Touri didn't seem the least bit shocked.

LABEL: 0x6587
STRING: And, Reiri being alive――?

LABEL: 0x65BD
STRING: 「Touri, you need to face the truth.」

LABEL: 0x65E3
STRING: 「Reiri... She's dead!」

LABEL: 0x66DA
STRING: 「Reiri, hey...!」

LABEL: 0x67EC
STRING: ―――The next moment.

LABEL: 0x6808
STRING: I was down on the floor.

LABEL: 0x6828
STRING: Why... Sudden dizziness?

LABEL: 0x684A
STRING: And standing before me was...

LABEL: 0x688B
STRING: 「Don't mind him, Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x68C0
STRING: It was Reiri's voice. The girl who should have died.

LABEL: 0x6901
STRING: 「Leave that dying doll alone.」

LABEL: 0x692B
STRING: 「Momoi Yukari. Where is she...? That treatment table over there?」

LABEL: 0x6972
STRING: 「Hey, Reiri! Apologize to Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x69AF
STRING: Flustered, Touri raised her voice in anger.

LABEL: 0x69E1
STRING: Apparently, she was mad at Reiri for my sake...

LABEL: 0x6A21
STRING: But... I couldn't keep up with the situation at all.

LABEL: 0x6B01
STRING: What was going on here?

LABEL: 0x6B1F
STRING: What the hell was happening?

LABEL: 0x6B41
STRING: Reiri was here?

LABEL: 0x6B5D
STRING: ...Where did she come from, and why――?

LABEL: 0x6BF9
STRING: 「Are you all right?」

LABEL: 0x6C70
STRING: 「Come on, grab my hand!」

LABEL: 0x6CBF
STRING: I heard Touri's voice, but I couldn't react.

LABEL: 0x6CF5
STRING: I didn't understand... what I was seeing and hearing.

LABEL: 0x6D35
STRING: I put my hands on the floor and managed to get up on my own.

LABEL: 0x6D6B
STRING: I managed to get myself up, but I――

LABEL: 0x6DA9
STRING: I couldn't keep up with reality.

LABEL: 0x6DF3
STRING: As if I were a ghost left behind in this world, unfulfilled...

LABEL: 0x6EA3
STRING: ...My reality crumbled.
